ModSettings.name: High Elven Mage Movement Fix
ModSettings.title: [Unit] High Elven Mage Movement Fix
ModSettings.description:
High Elven Mage Movement Fix
This is a fix to the High Elven Magicians base movement rate.
In the original, High Elven Magicians had a base movement rate of '2', as described here: https://masterofmagic.fandom.com/wiki/High_Elf_Magicians
While doubling the movement to '4' did not feel appropriate, increasing their movement to '3' was warranted.
ModSettings.author: DorianGray
